person.persName: Benoni Mills (Wayne County, KY, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Mary (Polly) Jones Mills in Wayne County on February 18, 1833. Father of John F. Mills, Frances Mills, Sarah L. Mills, Eliza Mills, Milton Mills, Jesse Mills, William K. Mills, and Harriet A. Mills. Owned one enslaved person in Wayne County in 1840. Farmer in Wayne County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Wayne County in 1850. Employed Eli Carrell as a day laborer in 1860. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860. Sheriff of Wayne County in 1865.
